title: Cup of milk tea will be  Rs.100 from tonight: Canteen Owners’ Assn.
body_lines: From tonight, the All Island Canteen Owners' Association (AICOA) is to increase the price of a cup of milk tea Rs.100.
He told the Daily Mirror that the decision was made due to an increase in sugar, tea leaves, and milk powder in the market.
Therefore, he requested the hotel and canteen owners to provide a healthy cup of milk tea with three teaspoons of milk powder that should not exceed 200ml.
Bringing the price of a cup of milk tea to Rs.100 in the local market will go into the record books in Sri Lankan history.
Despite the price increase, the canteen and hotel owners should keep in mind that the importance of providing a healthy cup of tea, he reiterated. (Chaturanga Samarawickrama)
